Class ObjectWriter

java.lang.Object
com.tangosol.coherence.rest.providers.ObjectWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<Object>
@Provider public class ObjectWriter extends Object implements jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<Object>
Provider responsible for marshalling Java objects.
